casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Clinton Cebert SMITH. No. 396A98-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 31, 2008. Lisa Miles, Kimberly Swank, for Smith. William Graham, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of November 2008 by State of NC to Dissolve Order Holding *23Time in which to File Certiorari Petition in Abeyance:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 31st day of December 2008."
